message: Someone really unforeseeable has to happen to keep me from coming to Florence ;-) *fingersCrossed*
I *really* want to go to Florence, but OSBridge in Portland runs exactly the same dates. This is a real conflict.
I created a new Convore group for EuroPython 2011: https://convore.com/europython-2011/
[I later discovered I was wrong about OS BRidge, but that I had teaching commitments anyway]
